================================

:meth:`~wx.lib.agw.aui.auibook.TabTextCtrl.__init__`                             Default class constructor.

:meth:`~wx.lib.agw.aui.auibook.TabTextCtrl.Finish`                               Finish editing.
:meth:`~wx.lib.agw.aui.auibook.TabTextCtrl.item`                                 Returns the item currently edited.
:meth:`~wx.lib.agw.aui.auibook.TabTextCtrl.OnChar`                               Handles the ``wx.EVT_CHAR`` event for :class:`TabTextCtrl`.
:meth:`~wx.lib.agw.aui.auibook.TabTextCtrl.OnKeyUp`                              Handles the ``wx.EVT_KEY_UP`` event for :class:`TabTextCtrl`.
:meth:`~wx.lib.agw.aui.auibook.TabTextCtrl.OnKillFocus`                          Handles the ``wx.EVT_KILL_FOCUS`` event for :class:`TabTextCtrl`.
:meth:`~wx.lib.agw.aui.auibook.TabTextCtrl.StopEditing`                          Suddenly stops the editing.
================================================================================ ================================================================================

|api| Class API
===============


.. class:: TabTextCtrl(ExpandoTextCtrl)

   Control used for in-place edit. 

   .. method:: __init__(self, owner, tab, page_index)

      Default class constructor.
      For internal use: do not call it in your code!
      
      :param `owner`: the :class:`AuiNotebook` owning the tab;
      :param `tab`: the actual :class:`AuiTabCtrl` tab;
      :param integer `page_index`: the :class:`AuiTabContainer` page index for the tab.


   .. method:: AcceptChanges(self)

      Accepts/refuses the changes made by the user. 


   .. method:: Finish(self)

      Finish editing. 


   .. method:: item(self)

      Returns the item currently edited. 


   .. method:: OnChar(self, event)

      Handles the ``wx.EVT_CHAR`` event for :class:`TabTextCtrl`.
      
      :param `event`: a :class:`KeyEvent` event to be processed.


   .. method:: OnKeyUp(self, event)

      Handles the ``wx.EVT_KEY_UP`` event for :class:`TabTextCtrl`.
      
      :param `event`: a :class:`KeyEvent` event to be processed.


   .. method:: OnKillFocus(self, event)

      Handles the ``wx.EVT_KILL_FOCUS`` event for :class:`TabTextCtrl`.
      
      :param `event`: a :class:`FocusEvent` event to be processed.


   .. method:: StopEditing(self)

      Suddenly stops the editing.
